doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Merajul Islam (Miraj)
doctor.specialty: Urology (Kidney, Ureter, Bladder, Prostate) Specialist & Surgeon
doctor.workplace: Shahabuddin Medical College Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Md. Merajul Islam (Miraj) is a leading urology (kidney, ureter, bladder, prostate) specialist and surgeon in Dhaka, holding qualifications of MBBS, MCPS (Surgery), MS (Urology), and FACS (USA). He specializes in the diagnosis and surgical management of conditions like kidney stones, prostate enlargement, urinary tract infections, ureteric stones, bladder tumors, male infertility, and urinary incontinence. Dr. Merajul Islam currently serves as Professor and Head of the Urology Department at Shahabuddin Medical College Hospital. He sees patients at Medinova Medical Services, Malibagh (Gemcon Business Tower, 255 New Circular Road, Dhaka) with visiting hours from 8pm to 10pm on Saturday, Sunday, Tuesday, and Wednesday.

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Md. Kamrul Islam
doctor.specialty: Kidney Transplant Surgeon & Urologist
doctor.workplace: Centre for Kidney Diseases and Urology Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Kamrul Islam is a Kidney transplant surgeon and urologist who won the Independence Award in 2022 for his contribution. He has been performing kidney transplants free of cost for the last decade, along with providing his patients follow-up services. After retiring as an assistant professor of the National Institute of Kidney Diseases and Urology in 2011, Dr. Kamrul Islam took personal initiative to establish CKD & Urology Hospital. The institution has now become a place of trust and affection for kidney patients across the country. Kidney transplant procedures here are carried out at the small cost of two lakh and ten thousand takas only. Dr. Kamrul Islam charges no money for this complicated procedure. They even provide follow-up care free of charge for patients for several months after the procedure. Professor Dr. Kamrul and his team have transplanted almost one thousand kidneys so far, with a success rate of 96 percent.

doctor.name: Major Gen. Prof. Dr. H. R. Harun
doctor.degree: MBBS (Dhaka), FCPS (Bangladesh), FRCS (Glasgow), FRCS (Edinburgh)Diploma in Urology (London), WHO Fellow (Urology)
doctor.specialty: Urology (Kidneys, Bladder, Ureters, Prostate) Specialist & Surgeon
doctor.workplace: Holy Family Red Crescent Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Maj Gen Dr. Hr Harun is dedicated to providing state-of-the-art medical and surgical care for all specialties of male and female urology (both adult and pediatric), as well as male infertility problems. Each year, he treats hundreds of patients and provides diagnosis, care, and surgeries for the complete range of urological conditions. He offers patients confidential evaluations, treatment, and follow-up care with state-of-the-art resources, like ultra-modern operations. Prof. Harun has especial interest in Nephron – Sparing Surgery, Reconstructive Urology, Microsurgery in Male Infertility, Endourology, Female Urology, Combat Surgery and Disaster Medicine.

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Mirza M. Hasan Faisal
doctor.specialty: Urologist and Kidney Transplant Surgeon
doctor.workplace: Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Mirza M. Hasan Faisal is a renowned urologist and kidney transplant surgeon in Dhaka, holding qualifications of MBBS, FCPS, FRCS (Edinburgh), and FICS. He serves as the Senior Consultant and Head of the Urology Department at Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College. Dr. Faisal is highly skilled in treating various urological conditions such as kidney stones, prostate enlargement, urinary bladder tumors, ureteric strictures, male infertility, and urinary tract infections, as well as performing complex kidney transplant surgeries. He offers consultations at BIRDEM Specialized Chamber Complex, Shahbag, Dhaka, from 2pm to 6pm, with Friday as his off day.

chamber.address: Main Building, 122, Kazi Nazrul Islam Avenue, Shahbag, Dhaka

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Saiful Islam
doctor.specialty: Urologist and AndrologistKidney, Ureter, Prostate, Bladder, Sexual Organs Specialist & Surgeon
doctor.workplace: National Institute of Kidney Diseases & Urology
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Saiful Islam is an experienced urologist and andrologist in Dhaka, holding MBBS, BCS (Health), and MS (Urology) degrees. He is currently working as a Consultant Urologist at the National Institute of Kidney Diseases & Urology. Dr. Saiful Islam specializes in the treatment of various urological and andrological diseases such as kidney stones, ureteric stones, prostate enlargement, urinary bladder tumors, male infertility, sexual health problems, urinary tract infections (UTI), and male sexual dysfunction. He provides consultations at Medinova Medical Services, Mirpur, Dhaka, where his visiting hours are from 5pm to 7pm (closed on Fridays).

chamber.address: Plot # 29-30, Block # Kha, Road # 1, Section # 6, Mirpur 10, Dhaka
